title: Mexico City, a megalopolis' war on plastic bags - UNEP
body: Now these plastic-free alternatives are making a comeback, along with straw baskets and reusable cloth bags, after a ban on plastic bags entered into effect in the megalopolis on 1 January 2020. ... "I was so worried about the news of dead animals in the oceans due to pollution, the imminent extinction of species and the little time left to ...
